Hi,

You have to uninstall everything before you install the 1.2 version. It is a complete package.

I forgot....

If you have the soundpackage, you have to reinstall that after you installed the 1.2 version since that is the only way the aircraft.cfg file will write the correct sound directories for each aircraft.
